### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position(x=60.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position(x=61.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position(x=61.5, y=-61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position(x=62.5, y=-60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter at position(x=62.5, y=-60.5) with fuel {} and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=62.5, y=-61.5) with inventory {}.

### Offshore Pump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5)
Consists of an OffshorePump at position(x=107.5, y=-33.5) with status EntityStatus.WORKING and connected pipes.

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0) with fuel {} and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a Generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group 1
Consists of pipes at positions [(x=107.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-34.5),(x=108.5,y=-34.5),(x=109.5,y=-32.5),(x=109.5,y=-33.5),(x=109.5,y=-31.5)] with fluid system 142794 and status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT.

### Pipe Group 2
Consists of pipes at positions [(x=111.5,y=-33.5),(x=113.5,y=-33.5),(x=112.5,y=-33.5),...,(x=114.5,y=-33.5),(x=117.5,y=-33.5),(x=116.5,y=-33.5)] with fluid system 142796 and status EntityStatus.EMPTY.

### Electricity Group
Consists of a small-electric-pole at position(x=119.5,y=-30.5) with voltage 0.

### Belt
Consists of belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect with pipes.
- Check that the pipe connections are valid and not obstructed by other entities.

### Errors when using inserters
- Ensure that the inserter has enough fuel to operate.
- Check that the inserter has a valid source and destination to transfer items.

### Errors when using boilers and steam engines
- Ensure that the boiler has enough fuel to operate.
- Check that the steam engine is properly connected to the boiler and has a valid input fluid.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
Important variables:
* `transport-belt`: 8
* `small-electric-pole`: 1
* `pipe`: 20
* `stone-furnace`: 1
* `wood`: 7
* `iron-ore`: 6
* `copper-ore`: 20
* `iron-plate`: 613
* `copper-plate`: 5
* `copper-cable`: 2
* `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
